"Fly with the Beauty of Bali: Experience Paradise from Above in a Helicopter!"

Get Started

WHY CHOOSE US

Experience and Professionalism

We have extensive experience in the aviation industry, specializing in helicopter tours. Our team of trained pilots understands helicopter operations thoroughly, ensuring the safety and comfort of our customers.

Breathtaking Scenic Destinations

We offer helicopter tours to extraordinary scenic destinations on the island of Bali. From the air, our customers can indulge in the beauty of mountains, beaches, and renowned places.

PRIORITIZE SAFETY FOR CUST

Our commitment is to adhere to standard regulations and mandatory helicopter safety operations.

We are a rapidly growing helicopter company in Bali, Indonesia. We believe that safety is our top priority, and our experienced team strives to provide the best hospitality and service to our customers while adhering to the mandatory standard regulations and safety guidelines set by the Directorate General of Civil Aviation in Indonesia. We operate brand new Bell 505 and Robinson R66 helicopters registered under AOC 135 in Indonesia. The spirit of Bali lives within our passionate and experienced pilots and staff, reflecting our commitment to quality, guest hospitality, and our love for the history, traditions, and culture of Bali.
